markdown:
<title level="1" right="Creature Family">[Flytrap](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=48)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 160</row>

Flytraps are dangerous creatures as eager to feed on humanoids and larger prey as they are monstrous insects.

<title level="2">Members</title>
[Giant Flytrap](/Monsters.aspx?ID=209) (Creature 10), [Snapping Flytrap](/Monsters.aspx?ID=208) (Creature 3)
name: Flytrap
